heading: Barrage Rogue Leveling Guide
content: is a simple to play, short to mid-range archer build that is great for leveling in Diablo 4. It combines a good mix of AoE and single target damage with high movement speed and solid defenses for an overall smooth experience. that fires multiple arrows spread out in a cone in front of you. While it's a ranged skill, it can only deal with large packs of monsters from a distance and you need to get close to hit individual targets with multiple arrows ( ), making it a very active playstyle that requires constant maneuvering. Once you have the main setup together, it's all smooth sailing until the endgame.
